title: 3 HYPNOTIZED WOMEN WITHOUT ANY WORDS SAID / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS MASTERCLASS
description:
Dr. Marco Paret's student is hypnotizing three other students on his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass. The techniques that the student used are powerful, unique and completely non-verbal. He did magnetic passes on the three ladies and they enter in deep hypnotic trances, that liberated and changed them in a positive direction. Dr. Marco Paret is teaching the ancient traditions of Mesmerism & Fascination - the power of the gaze, in his courses. You can master them too! Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
